title: Alarm not working
content:
Android Alarm does not work at all. No sounds. It is not hardware - I can play the alarm sound manually just fine. Don't waste time with the "uninstall updates" advice, it does not work. I just installed another alarm app from the play store and it works perfectly.

Look at the community posts. Google broke the alarm a long time ago and has not fixed it, which is just another example of their disregard for quality and customer service.

If anyone at Google has  real answer, let's hear it.
